headline: Warner Bros. Discovery, NBA Settle Legal Battle Over TV Rights
summary: A deal gives the company access to NBA content and rights in parts of Northern Europe and Latin America. Turner will license “Inside the NBA” to ESPN.

raw.headline: Warner Bros. Discovery, NBA Settle Legal Battle Over TV Rights
raw.summary: A deal gives the company access to NBA content and rights in parts of Northern Europe and Latin America. Turner will license “Inside the NBA” to ESPN.
